name: Mafia War Shooting: FPS Game
description:
Mafia War Shooting: FPS Game!!!
Get ready for action bursting 3D Open World environment & feel the excitement of shooting survival. You will obtain the entire weaponry to shoot the wicked terrorist mafia. Become a protagonist survivor shooter of this FPS survival action arena game. It’s a great fire gun up fighting chance for you to eliminate the elite rivals in battle map online arena of a free survival game.
Features:
• Engaging FPS gameplay
• Realistic shooting effect
• Powerful modern weapons
• Challenging missions to compete
• Thrilling sound effects
• Amazing graphics
